metadata.name: The Goddess of the Flaming Dawn (NFT+p. painting!)
metadata.description:
The Goddess of the Flaming Dawn

I am joy, exuberance and fire, heaven and earth love me
I caress and charm the world, I drink bliss from the lips of flowers,
I am the gusto, the momentum and the endless joy
Oh, simple mortals, if only once you would look from the perspective of the Sun!

When you stand at dawn by the sea shore,
And behold the sky ablaze with red
Think that I was born of embers, that love ignites my flames
And in my veins dwell universes of millions

Upon purchase, the collector receives:

Hi-res photograph (3868 Ñ… 2616) pixels with a 300 dpi resolution
First Owner - Signed physical oil painting on canvas, size: 120 x 80 cm 

This painting was created during the War. In this NFT I am recording the story of what happened for all eternity! My painting was interrupted by phone calls from Ukraine, calls from my Mum and Brother and family in Ukraine. 

I would like to dedicate this painting to all my compatriots, refugees and Poles who have opened their hearts and homes.
